attributes.action: Link student interest increases to the repayment threshold.
attributes.additional_details: With sky high interest rates exceeding some private borrowing methods, due to a masive increase in inflation, student loans still need to be a good deal for students. The repayment cap was ment to rise in relation to this but it has been frozen unfairly at £21000.
attributes.background: We call for Student loans sudent loans back to how they should have been with the £21000 repayment threshold linked to the increase in inflation in line with the interest rate.

rejection.details:
If you are concerned about interest on student loans, you might like to sign this petition instead: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/195013
